event: User request for Track Access from TC
description: TPO Ho calls Main Line Zero One to request for Track Access using Individual Calls ( Main Line Zero One responded on Main Line Zero One); and in this case request is denied, as OCS is still live.

conversation.utterance: Main Line Zero One, Send, over
TPO Ho, Can I access the tracks, over
Main Line Zero One, Negative. OCS is still live, over
TPO Ho, Wilco, out

event: Emergency Situation
description: Car 22 reports rail crack near point 701 on track Sierra One East.

conversation.utterance: Emergency, Emergency, Depot Zero, this is Car Two Two at track Sierra One East. Rail crack spotted near point Seven Zero One, over.
Depot Zero, read back message, stop your train immediately and standby for further instructions, over.
Car Two Two, I read back message, train stopped, standing by for further instructions, over.
Depot Zero, roger, wait out.
